member.name: T:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities
member.summary: Some simple console utilities I use on my projects.

member.name: P:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.TitleColor
member.summary: Text color used in the ShowTitle method.

member.name: P:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.DivisionSign
member.summary: Char used to make the divisions on the console.

member.name: P:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.SubDivisionSign
member.summary: Char used to make the sub divisions on the console.

member.name: P:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.DivisionColor
member.summary: Color used to make divisions on the console.

member.name: P:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.SubDivisionColor
member.summary: Color used to make sub divisions on the console.

member.name: P:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.InfoMessageColor
member.summary: Text color used in the InfoMessage method.

member.name: P:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.SuccessMessageColor
member.summary: Text color used in the SuccessMessage method.

member.name: P:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.WarningMessageColor
member.summary: Text color used in the WarningMessage method.

member.name: P:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.ErrorMessageColor
member.summary: Text color used in the ErrorMessage method.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.ShowTitle(System.String[])
member.summary: Shows each line of the given array to the console, uses the color of TitleColor.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.ShowVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Logs a Runnning Version message with the color of warning. You can get the version of the assembly by calling: System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetName().Version.ToString());

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.CenterLine(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the given with the right amount of spaces to be centered on the screen.
member.returns: The text with the right amount of spaces.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.Division
member.summary: Creates a division with a length equal to the Console.BufferWidth, uses the DivisionSign property to make the division.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.Division(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a Cyan division with the specified , uses the DivisionSign property to make the division.
member.param: The length of the division to create.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.SubDivision
member.summary: Creates a sub-division with a length equal to the Console.BufferWidth Uses the SubDivisionSign property to make the division.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.SubDivision(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a sub-division with the specified , uses the SubDivisionSign property to make the division.
member.param: The length of the division to create.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.LogInfoMessage(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Shows the specified , With the color of InfoMessageColor, is passed as is to the Console.WriteLine method.
member.param: The message to write to the console.
An array of objects to write using.
member.returns: The length of the string that was logged, useful for using ClearPreviousLog.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.LogSuccessMessage(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Shows the specified , With the color of SuccessMessageColor, is passed as is to the Console.WriteLine method.
member.param: The message to write to the console.
An array of objects to write using.
member.returns: The length of the string that was logged, useful for using ClearPreviousLog.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.LogWarningMessage(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Shows the specified , With the color of WarningMessageColor, is passed as is to the Console.WriteLine method.
member.param: The message to write to the console.
An array of objects to write using.
member.returns: The length of the string that was logged, useful for using ClearPreviousLog.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.LogErrorMessage(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Shows the specified , With the color of ErrorMessageColor, is passed as is to the Console.WriteLine method.
member.param: The message to write to the console.
An array of objects to write using.
member.returns: The length of the string that was logged, useful for using ClearPreviousLog.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.LogFormat(System.String,System.ConsoleColor,System.Object[])
member.summary: Logs the message with the specified arguments.
member.returns: The length of the string that was logged, useful for using ClearPreviousLog.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.LogImage(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a message that shows that the is being copied to , the color used is from LogImageColor.
member.param: The path of the image that is being copied.
The new path that the image will be copied to.
member.returns: The length of the string that was logged, useful for using ClearPreviousLog.

member.name: M:ConsoleUtilitiesLite.ConsoleUtilities.ClearPreviousLog(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the previous log. Nothing should be outputted to the console between the call of a log and this function for this function to work properly.
member.param: The size of the previous logged string
